values.label: 1st week of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the first week of the month.

values.label: 2nd week of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the second week of the month.

values.label: 3rd week of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the third week of the month.

values.label: 4th week of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the fourth week of the month.

values.label: 5th week of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the fifth week of the month.

values.label: 1st and 3rd weeks of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the first and third week of the month.

values.label: 2nd and 4th weeks of the month
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur in the second and fourth week of the month.

values.label: Monday through Friday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur between Monday and Friday (inclusive).

values.label: Monday through Saturday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur between Monday and Saturday (inclusive).

values.label: Monday through Sunday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur between Monday and Sunday (inclusive).

values.label: Monday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Monday.

values.label: Tuesday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Tuesday.

values.label: Wednesday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Wednesday.

values.label: Thursday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Thursday.

values.label: Friday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Friday.

values.label: Saturday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Saturday.

values.label: Sunday
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur on a Sunday.

values.label: Immediately
values.comment: At the earliest date/time within the defined lead time.

values.label: As directed
values.comment: Despatch has or will occur as directed.

values.label: Each week of the month
values.comment: Shipments/deliveries are anticipated weekly within the month specified.

values.label: Daily Monday through Friday
values.comment: Shipments/deliveries are anticipated, five days per week.

values.label: First decade of the month
values.comment: First ten days of a calendar month.

values.label: Second decade of the month
values.comment: Eleventh through twentieth day of a calendar month.

values.label: Third decade of the month
values.comment: Twenty-first through last day of a calendar month.

values.label: Each working hour
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 1 working hour.

values.label: Each 2 working hours
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 2 working hours.

values.label: Each 3 working hours
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 3 working hours.

values.label: Each 4 working hours
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 4 working hours.

values.label: Each working day
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 1 working day.

values.label: Each 2 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 2 working days.

values.label: Each 3 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 3 working days.

values.label: Each 4 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 4 working days.

values.label: Each 5 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 5 working days.

values.label: Each 6 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 6 working days.

values.label: Each 8 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 8 working days.

values.label: Each 9 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 9 working days.

values.label: Each 10 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 10 working days.

values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 11 working days.

values.label: Each 12 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 12 working days.

values.label: Each 13 working days
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 13 working days.

values.label: Each working week
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 1 working week.

values.label: Each 2 working weeks
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 2 working weeks.

values.label: Each 3 working weeks
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 3 working weeks.

values.label: Each 4 working weeks
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 4 working weeks.

values.label: Each working month
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 1 working month.

values.label: Each 2 working months
values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 2 working months.

values.comment: Routine despatches occur in cycles of 3 working months.

values.label: Mutually defined
values.comment: Despatch pattern according to bilateral agreement.
